website_summaries.verdict: Tame both oily and dry patches of skin with this versatile primer.
pros: Oil-free primer is complementary to all skin types
Keeps oil at bay while hydrating your skin at the same time
A small amount goes a long way
Prevents foundation from melting or separating on your skin
cons: Primer tends to settle into fine lines around the eyes

customer_reviews.title: Light & silky, and not oily.  Great primer under liquid makeup.
customer_reviews.text: Face primer for under liquid makeup. Very smooth, light and silky yet not oily. It resembles a past product they'd produced for years but discontinued. Took a chance that it was similar and it was....yea! Seems like the just renamed it.
customer_reviews.author: alexree

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! A girl at ULTA told me about this product great for people with oil and dry skin. It's the only primer I use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica I.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Your skin feels so silky after use....great base for mineral powder makeup.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It applies well and doesn't cause any irritation, but I'm afraid it doesn't seem to make my foundation last any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Liz O

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: The only brand of primer that does not cause my skin to break out. Works great with my Bare Minerals makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it didn't work well for my skin type. It was a thin liquid that didn't feel like much once it dryed. And it didnt keep my make up on longer either.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne oseguera

customer_reviews.title: Love Primer
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin smooth, soft and even. Great for under my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Rindy

customer_reviews.title: Bare minerals.
customer_reviews.text: Have used last 2 days seem to like. Not to greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Consider this a serum. Not a primer.
customer_reviews.text: More like a serum. Not at all what I was expecting from a primer.
customer_reviews.author: Alta7080

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! First time using and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Faber

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews said this was closer to the old formula, but my face is oily as hell after a couple of hours. It also isn't making my makeup stick like a primer should. I really wish they would bring back the old formula.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My face don’t get oily at all after using this plus wearing fenty makeup
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Bare Escentuals Combo Control Milky Face Primer 0, Multi (I0083130)
product_meta.description: Combo Control primer provides the perfect balance to those with combination skin. It has the effect of a soft focus filter, it absorbs oil in the T-zone and other shiny spots, while maintaining all-important moisture balance.
feature_bullets: This primer improved their makeup application
